metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4188 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in CORS in Google Chrome onAndroid prior to 108.0.5359.71 allowed a remote attacker to bypass sameorigin policy via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
